phrs.translation: 形式化, 形式, 规范化, 正规化
规范化阶段, 式化阶段, 形式化阶段
图灵机形式化, 翻译

sentences.sentence: There is a significant difference in the degree of detail, formalization, and, of course, structure.
sentences.translation: 这两者在详细程度、规范化程度和结构方面有显著差异。

sentences.sentence: A formalization of the de-facto standard XMLHttpRequest object, the centerpiece of Ajax communication.
sentences.translation: 事实标准XMLHttpRequest对象的正式化，它是Ajax通信的核心。

sentences.sentence: It is simply a reorientation and formalization of many of the things good software architects have been doing all along.
sentences.translation: 它不过是重定位和规范化大多数优秀软件架构师已经一直在做的事情。
